actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it an unlawful employment practice to discriminate against individuals who are physically disabled because of such disability.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to include as an unlawful employment practice discrimination on the basis of physical handicap.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it an unlawful employment practice to discriminate against individuals who are physically disabled because of such disability.
